doc.title: B.L.O.B.
doc.plot: Taking its cue from another under-appreciated '80s environmental genre parable C.H.U.D., the Hayes have given an anachronism to their "blob." "It's now 'B.L.O.B.' which stands for Biological Lethal Organic Bomb," says Carey. "At the time they brought it to us we were like, 'not interested.!' And they said, 'Oh come on, challenge yourselves!'"
